txt.en: Atop the Crown of Caranost, the true leader of the invading Orcs resides in power. Search the apex of the ruins for the servant of evil masterminding this invasion.
'Uruks of the White Hand, here? We must warn the others. This is a development that requires greater attention.'
Beyond the Orc command post in Caranost there is a secret path. That path leads to the apex of the ruins and the true force behind the menace within.
Find and defeat the true leader of the Orc forces at Caranost
